thread.title: Tommy Middaugh Travel To Go Vice President Reviews Upcoming Labor Day Events in Chicago
thread.title_full: Tommy Middaugh Travel To Go Vice President Reviews Upcoming Labor Day Events in Chicago

author: Media Relations
title: Tommy Middaugh Travel To Go Vice President Reviews Upcoming Labor Day Events in Chicago
text:
For all those who have never had the chance to experience Travel To Go’s stellar travel services before, it provides top of the line accommodations, a variety of decadent amenities as well as customer service that can’t be beat. Because of the time Travel To Go takes to suggest different destinations, travelers will soon find this company is one that holds the key for tons of family fun. All these things are only some of the reasons why so many people adore Travel To Go so much. Spending Labor Day in a fun city is always a goal for many families, and that’s why Tommy Middaugh recommends visiting Chicago during this holiday. Here are some of the best events to attend while visiting the city of Chicago for some Labor Day festivities.
 Music Lovers, Rejoice: All those out there who are hoping to hear some delightful tunes will want to spend time at this amazing event. The Englewood Jazz Festival is a yearly event that many gather from all over to enjoy. Watch 5 different finalists perform their biggest hits and find out who will take home the top prize during the awards ceremony. This event is free, and will be held at Hamilton Park Cultural Center (September 3-6). Shop Till They Drop: Tommy Middaugh, Travel To Go Vice President, knows one of the most popular pastimes of many vacationers is hunting for the perfect souvenir. Travelers who attend this exciting event won’t have to look much further. The Magnificent Mile Shopping Festival is home to quite a few outdoor vendors and shops, as well as culinary tastings and concerts as well. Last but not least, there will also be a women’s run to participate in as well, so all that attend will find something to enjoy. (September 4-7).
 Famous Festival: About 30 miles outside of Chicago lies Naperville, home to the famous Naperville Last Fling. This family-friendly event is one that Tommy Middaugh of Travel To Go shares features delicious home cooking, carnival rides and games, different musical performers on various stages and more held down at the Riverwalk. (September 4-7).
All this and more awaits travelers hoping for Labor Day fun while visiting the vibrant city of Chicago. For more information about planning an upcoming trip, consider Travel To Go a valued source. Visit them online at http://www.traveltogo.com/
###
Travel To Go
7964 B Arjons Drive
San Diego, CA 92126, USA
Phone: (800) 477-6331
